Notes.Text:
cups, cups154 was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2014-9679: A malformed compressed raster file can trigger a buffer overflow in cupsRasterReadPixels (bnc#917799).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Integer underflow in the cupsRasterReadPixels function in filter/raster.c in CUPS before 2.0.2 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a malformed compressed raster file, which triggers a buffer overflow.
